channel.title: CVE Feed for Wiloke -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wiloke -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3933|2024-08-02T07:08:50.823Z -- wiloke -- your%20journey
item.description: The Your Journey theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via prototype pollution in versions up to, and including, 1.9.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-1436|2024-02-26T15:55:27.147Z -- wiloke -- woocommerce%20coupon%20popup%2C%20smartbar%2C%20slide%20in%20%7C%20myshopkit
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Wiloke WooCommerce Coupon Popup, SmartBar, Slide In | MyShopKit.This issue affects WooCommerce Coupon Popup, SmartBar, Slide In | MyShopKit: from n/a through 1.0.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-1436|2024-08-01T18:40:21.405Z -- wiloke -- woocommerce%20coupon%20popup%2C%20smartbar%2C%20slide%20in%20%7C%20myshopkit
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Wiloke WooCommerce Coupon Popup, SmartBar, Slide In | MyShopKit.This issue affects WooCommerce Coupon Popup, SmartBar, Slide In | MyShopKit: from n/a through 1.0.9.
